prefercite.p: Local 1199 Bread and Roses Cultural Project Posters #6089 G. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p: 9 - copies of two different broadsides - 1)Martin Luther King, Jr. "adding grace and hope to our struggle for economic justice" ; 2)Take Care A New Musical
14 - 1)Who Made Your Shoes ; 2) Faith, Vision, Action ; 3)Malcolm X and 1199 ; 4)Langston Hughes ; 5)Frederick Douglass and his times ; 6)40 Years of Progress ; 7)Organize ; some have multiple copies
